name: generous
description:

description:
greedy makes this human more inclined to corruption

name: ignorant
description:
ignorant keep darkness in this human mind

description:
intelligent, a light in this mortal's mind slow done your steps

description:

an horrible scar keep people away

an anathem is casted on this mortal, other mortals hate him

name: falseGod

description:
